entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Cummins Lakes (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:07 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -9.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Golden Airport 2:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
